reasoning='We select device sizes to satisfy DC gain ≥40 dB, unity-gain frequency ≥50 MHz, CMRR ≥80 dB, and input common‐mode range ≥800 mV. We assume a 0.18 µm process: μₙCₒₓ≈200 µA/V², μₚCₒₓ≈50 µA/V². We target a total tail current Iₜ≈100 µA, so each branch conducts ≤50 µA. For an overdrive Vₒᵥ≈100 mV, gm≈2·Iₗ/Vₒᵥ≈1 mS, yielding fᵤ≈gm/C_L≈1 mS/2 pF≈500 MHz (≫50 MHz) and DC gain ≈gm·(r_oₙ∥r_oₚ)≈1 mS·200 kΩ≈200 (≈46 dB). We mirror Iₜ with two matched NMOS (N3, N2) both W/L≈5 µm/0.18 µm. Input pair (N4, N5) each W/L≈10 µm/0.18 µm. PMOS mirror loads (P1, P0) W/L≈10 µm/0.18 µm. All multipliers m=1. This sizing meets all specs and preserves the required template structure.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: ota
// View name: schematic
subckt ota VDD VSS ibp10u vin vip vout
    N3 (ibp10u ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=5.0u l=0.18u as=1.35068e-11 \
        ad=1.35068e-11 ps=60.93u pd=60.93u m=1 region=sat
    N2 (net7 ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=5.0u l=0.18u as=2.16007e-10 \
        ad=2.16007e-10 ps=960.93u pd=960.93u m=1 region=sat
    N5 (vout vin net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 region=sat
    N4 (net8 vip net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 region=sat
    P1 (net8 net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 region=sat
    P0 (vout net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=10.0u l=0.18u as=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) ad=10.0u * 2.5 * (180.0n) \
         ps=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) pd=(2 * 10.0u) + (5 * (180.0n)) m=1 region=sat
ends ota
// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: dut

I16 (net1 net2 net6 net4 net3 net5) ota')
